text: (tab) unake paigambaron ne (unase) kaha kya tum ko khuda ke baare mein shaq hai jo saare aasamaan va zameen ka paida karane vaala (aur) vah tumako apanee taraph bulaata bhee hai to isalie ki tumhaare gunaah maaph kar de aur ek vakt muqarrar tak tumako (duniya mein chain se) rahane de vah log bol uthe ki tum bhee bas hamaare hee se aadamee ho (achchha) ab samajhe tum ye chaahate ho ki jin maaboodon kee hamaare baap daada parasatish karate the tum hamako unase baaz rakho achchha agar tum sachche ho to koee saaph khula hua sareehee maujiza hame la dikhao
